snippet: Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac, which back most home loans, will raise fees for other borrowers, like those who buy investment properties, to balance out the cost of the fee reduction.
abstract: Federal Housing Finance Agency will announce changes to mortgage fees paid by some borrowers to Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac; housing advocates say change is only of modest help to most borrowers and does not go far enough.
lead_paragraph: Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac, which back most home loans, will raise fees for other borrowers, like those who buy investment properties, to balance out the cost of the fee reduction.

headline.main: Freddie and Fannie to Lower Some Fees
headline.print_headline: Freddie and Fannie to Lower Some Fees

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Federal Home Loan Mortgage Corp (Freddie Mac)
